name: SUGAZMIG
description: Gazdag's phase-shift migration for zero-offset data, with attenuation Q

parameter_descriptions.ntau: Number of migrated time samples (default=nt from data)
parameter_descriptions.dtau: Migrated time sampling interval (default=dt from header)
parameter_descriptions.tmig: Times corresponding to interval velocities in vmig
parameter_descriptions.vmig: Interval velocities corresponding to times in tmig
parameter_descriptions.ceil: Gain ceiling beyond which migration ceases
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
